import React from "react"; import { Link as ScrollLink } from "react-scroll"; const aboutData = { cvpath: "media/Emmanuel Owen - Web Developer.pdf", image: "images/img.jpg", name: "Emmanuel Owen", location: "Birmingham, UK", birthday: "VII-V-MCMXCIV", email: "chuloowen@gmail.com", aboutMe: "For 5 years, I have studied and inscribed the sacred runes and performed the arcane rituals that breathe life into the realm of the internet. A Front-end developer passionate about delivering exceptional results and metrics and outperforming previous “best-yet”. A developer who is bi/multilingual and skilled at creating a unique customer experience that highlights brand message, improves click and conversion rates by driving customer experience and keeps current on technological trends and advancement. Managed the delivery of mission-critical products to critical applications within an agile framework; Previously I focused on building accessible, human-centered products at (Hitch).", }; function About() { return (

Hello,

{aboutData.aboutMe}

Name: {aboutData.name}

Birthday: {aboutData.birthday}

Location: {aboutData.location}

Email: {aboutData.email}

Download CV Hire me
); } export default About;
